definition: Niya, ancient kingdom near Khotan in Xinjiang, 1st century BC-4th century AD
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

sentences.english: Ania lives at No. 34, Green Street.
sentences.chinese: 艾尼雅住在格林大街34号。

sentences.english: Adonijah and all the guests who were with him heard it as they were finishing their feast.
sentences.chinese: 亚多尼雅和所请的众客筵宴方毕，听见这声音。

sentences.english: And this is the copy of the letter which he had sent to Onias.
sentences.chinese: 这是从前寄给敖尼雅的信的副本。

sentences.english: Aeneas lived in a town called Lydda which is near Joppa which is on the coast.
sentences.chinese: 以尼雅居住在一个名叫吕大的镇，在沿海的约帕附近。

sentences.english: And Josias begot Jechonias and his brethren in the transmigration of Babylon.
sentences.chinese: 约史雅在巴比伦流徙期间生耶苛尼雅和他的兄弟们。
亚多尼雅对他说，进来吧。

sentences.english: Bathsheba therefore went unto king Solomon, to speak unto him for Adonijah.
sentences.chinese: 于是，拔示巴去见所罗门王，要为亚多尼雅提说。

sentences.english: The successors of Jehoiakim: Jehoiachin his son, and Zedekiah. The Royal Line After the Exile
sentences.chinese: 约雅敬的儿子是耶哥尼雅和西底家。

sentences.english: And Adonijah feared because of Solomon, and arose, and went, and caught hold on the horns of the altar.
sentences.chinese: 亚多尼雅惧怕所罗门，就起来，去抓住祭坛的角。

sentences.english: And after they were brought to Babylon, Jechonias begat Salathiel;
sentences.chinese: 迁到巴比伦之后，耶哥尼雅生撒拉铁。

sentences.english: But Adonijah, in fear of Solomon, went and took hold of the horns of the altar.
sentences.chinese: 亚多尼雅惧怕所罗门，就起来，去抓住祭坛的角。

sentences.english: Aeneas," Peter said to him, "Jesus Christ heals you.
sentences.chinese: 彼得对他说，以尼雅，耶稣基督医好你了。

sentences.english: So Hananiah the prophet died the same year in the seventh month.
sentences.chinese: 这样，先知哈拿尼雅当年七月间就死了。

sentences.english: Peter heals a bed ridden man called Aeneas.
sentences.chinese: 彼得治愈了一个叫以尼雅，瘫痪了的人。

sentences.english: Then tidings came to Joab: for Joab had turned after Adonijah, though he turned not after Absalom.
sentences.chinese: 约押虽然没有归从押沙龙，却归从了亚多尼雅。

sentences.english: When Bathsheba went to King Solomon to speak to him for Adonijah, the king stood up to meet her, bowed down to her and sat down on his throne.
sentences.chinese: 于是，拔示巴去见所罗门王，要为亚多尼雅提说。

definition: (phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]
Hailun county level city in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang/Helen or Hélène (name)
see 莎草[suo1 cao3]/see 摩莎[mo2 suo1]
